term.title: isotropic

item.text: A quantity which is independent of direction. Anisotropic and nonisotropic refer to quantities which are direction dependent.

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2198 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
